first_translate: I was lonely...

hangle: 누군가 날 필요로 해주면 좋겠다고 생각했다.
first_translate: and I wanted someone to need me.

hangle: 이 벌레만도 못한 목숨이라도 의미가 있을까?
first_translate: was there any purpose for this life that wasn’t even worth as much as a bug’s?

hangle: 시간이 지나고, 용병단은 헤일론 영지의 방어를 맡게 되었다.
first_translate: time passed by, and our mercenary group became responsible for defending hailon territory from monsters.
fighting them was dangerous, but at least we got paid well.

hangle: 나는 제대로 된 무기도 받지 못하고,
first_translate: even though they didn’t give me proper weapons,
I managed to survive using swords I picked up on battlefields.

hangle: 끝도 없는 고단한 싸움의 좋은 점이 있다면
first_translate: if there is one good thing about these endless battles,
it would probably be how strong I’ve become after fighting so many times for my life.
I survived.
but something went terribly wrong.
we’re being pushed back!
retreat immediately!
pull out! pull out!

hangle: 거기서 뭐 하는 거냐! 굼뜬 자식!
first_translate: what are you doing?! get moving, lazy bum!!
hah... if he thinks I’m useless,
then maybe I can just act like his human shield or something!
siegren must live.
siegren has to stay alive.
stay alive...
that's why I fought hard to survive.
but no matter how skilled I’d become,
my efforts were still not enough.
is this finally where I die?
for some reason, I feel relieved.
the only regrettable part is...

hangle: 그딴 쓰레기 같은 놈을 대신해 죽는다는 거다.
first_translate: ...that I have to take the fall for such scum.
if I had to sacrifice myself for anyone,

hangle: 나와 비슷한 처지의 사람을 구하고 싶었는데…
first_translate: I wish I could save people who are going through what I am right now...

hangle: 그래. 좀 더 도움이 필요한 사람,
first_translate: right. I want to help those who really need it more than others--
those weaker than everyone else.

hangle: 왜냐면 내가 고독했을 때는 누구도 도움을 주지 않았으니까.
first_translate: no one helped me when I felt alone,

hangle: 그러니 적어도 나는 도움을 주고 싶었어.
first_translate: so I at least wanted to offer aid to others.

hangle: 누군가 나처럼 살지 않기를 바라는 건 나약해.
first_translate: it may seem weak, but I don’t want anyone to go through what I did.

hangle: 그런 생각이나 하니 결국 이렇게 죽는 거야.
first_translate: now look at me. here I am dying because of thoughts like that.

hangle: 그래도 내 소망이 헛된 게 아니라고 믿고 싶어.
first_translate: but I still believe that my wishes weren’t futile.
I hope somewhere out there, light exists.

hangle: 아니면 내가 누군가의 빛이 되고 싶어.
first_translate: or better yet, I want to be the light for someone else.
of course, that won’t happen anymore since I’ll soon be dead.

hangle: 누군가 어둠 속에서 내 머리를 쓰다듬는다.
first_translate: a hand strokes my head while I'm surrounded by darkness.
it feels gentle enough to make tears come to my eyes...
where... am I?
huh? wait...
a girl...?
in all my years living a wretched existence,

hangle: 지긋지긋했던 내 인생에서 가장 평화로운 광경이었다.
first_translate: this moment was the most peaceful scene I ever experienced.
does your wound hurt?
let me see.
stop touching me without permission.
